h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The first Mind Core can be found upon defeating Lingxuzi in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside The Forest Shrine area in Black Wind Mountain. This is a main boss, so you can't miss it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 2'.
The content is as follows:
The first Mind Core can be found upon defeating Lingxuzi in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside The Forest Shrine area in Black Wind Mountain. This is a main boss, so you can't miss it.
